headline: ExxonMobil, SOCAR Sign Deal to Explore Onshore Oil in Azerbaijan
summary: XOM signs new deal with SOCAR to explore Azerbaijan's untapped onshore oil, eyeing unconventional reserves for growth.

raw.headline: ExxonMobil, SOCAR Sign Deal to Explore Onshore Oil in Azerbaijan

headline: Should You Invest $1,000 in ExxonMobil Today?
summary: ExxonMobil is one of the best-run oil companies in the world.  The oil company plans to deliver strong earnings and cash flow growth through 2030.  ExxonMobil (NYSE: XOM) is an undisputed leader in the oil industry.
